name: next-blog
description: Markdown based blog using next.js powered by jackieli

scripts.build:export: npm run build && npm run export
scripts.deploy: npm run build:content && npm run build:export && mv out public
scripts.v-patch: npm version patch && git push --tags && npm publish && git push
scripts.v-minor: npm version minor && git push --tags && npm publish && git push
scripts.v-major: npm version major && git push --tags && npm publish && git push

author: jackieli
